title.rendered: How to Compete Against the Big Fish

content.rendered:
Every business, whether online or offline, aspires to grow. But the competition it faces from the incumbents in the market makes it difficult for it to get in front of their target audience.

In this webinar hosted by Vipul Bansal from VWO, our CEO, Mogens Møller, shares insights on how e-commerce businesses can beat the incumbents and make a strong presence in their target market by truly understanding their visitor personas and motivating the visitors to make a purchase decision.

Key Takeaways

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • Discovering the aha moment for your business
  • Creating real personas by understanding your visitors’ situations
  • Guiding your visitors on your website instead of just acting as order-receivers
